column4: how do you upgrade ubuntu? when 8.10 comes out, how much of a hassle is it to upgrade fro m8.04 ?
coz 8.04 is my first ubuntu install
8.10 is going to be what? Incontinent Iguana ?
just so i could run TWO copies of a free OS heh
heh nah, i needed another physical one... a small one for use in the data center when holding my full sized one while trying to configure a serve via ssh with the other is har
you have to go down to the DC to config boxes? poor you...
my main laptop is a thinkpad T61p... i bought a X40 for portable tasks... i was going to get an eeepc but a second had x40 has heaps more power, a far better screen and is half the price
well... i recently had to install a bunch of servers
cant really physically put them on rails via ssh ;)
lies... we have "server monkies" that do it for us, it's basically the same thing
yea, but i pay far lower rates for a "here's your ru space... i'll be back after lunch" type service hehe
